mapper.insert: insert into tb_project_annex (annex_id, annex_name, type_id, project_id, path) values (#{annexId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{annexName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select annex_id, annex_name, type_id, project_id, path from tb_project_annex
select annex_id, annex_name, type_id, project_id, path from tb_project_annex where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and type_id=6
